assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare no competing interests.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The study protocol was approved by the ethical committee of the Emek Medical Center, Afula, following the Helsinki Declaration. Research number EMC-0010-16. All procedures followed were in accordance with the ethical standards of the responsible committee on human experimentation (institutional and national) and with the Helsinki Declaration of 1975, as revised in 2000 (5).

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Informed consent was obtained from all patients included in the study.
